name: Drop Attack
description:
Drop Attack is a drop-type puzzle game. Connect four or more tiles of the same color to make them disappear. Upper tiles will fall down and trigger chain reactions. In MultiPlayer mode you will attack your opponents and fill up their boards with garbage tiles.

Features:
- Single player mode with four game modes:
-- Classic
-- Extended (extra items like bombs, wildcards etc)
-- Attack (playing against the time)
-- Versus CPU (playing against CPU controlled opponent in three levels of difficulty)
- Local multi player mode (WIFI/Bluetooth) for 2 - 4 player-competitions with two game modes:
-- Classic
-- Extended (extra items like bombs, wildcards etc)
- 12 retro style classic tunes
- 20 achievements (Game Center)
- 13 global highscore lists (Game Center)
- Tutorial
- No in app purchases
- Optimized for all display sizes
- Flawless touch controls
